file_content.text: You faced the trials. You have my respect.
Face the trials, outsider. Unless you are afraid.
The trials are for the Mystics. Their training ends here.
The trials claim many--you may not survive.
I expect an apology when I come back.
You shouldn't doubt me.
You will be disappointed.
I don't suppose you have any advice for an outsider.
I could use an edge.
The trials are for the Mystics. Think as they do.
Death doesn't scare me.
The trials will test your resolve.
Enter the Proving Grounds. The trials await.
I want to begin the trials. I was told to speak with Dalga-Wo.
Fadith-Ki sent word. He claims you are worthy.
The trials are sacred. Why does an outsider seek entry?
I have a condition that can only be cured this way.
I've come for healing.
You may find death instead.
I seek the Blessing of Oneness from a Mystic.
I'm here for a blessing.
You may not be deserving.
There's someone I have to see inside.
I've got a meeting.
They are known. You are not.
I'm a humble pilgrim seeking to enter the shrine.
Same reason the Voss do.
You are an outsider.
Will you stop me if you don't approve?
What do you care?
No. You have earned your chance to die.
Don't question me, fool.
The Mystics must be protected.
Outsiders do not belong here.
They're important to you.
For the bragging rights.
